customer_addr:
3101 SE Ferry Slip Rd
Newport, OR 97365

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am on
6/5/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by Called facility owner who answered. Head advised
he's in Washington state and he'll call the person who may be there taking care of the animals to let me in he'd call me
back. After a few minutes he called back and he could not reach the person. I advised I'd wait for 30 minutes then I'll have
to record an attempted inspection. Just in case the employee was inside the facility, I knocked on door then yelled to see
if anyone available. No response.. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am on 
6/5/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by Called facility owner who answered. Head advised 
he's in Washington state and he'll call the person who may be there taking care of the animals to let me in he'd call me 
back. After a few minutes he called back and he could not reach the person. I advised I'd wait for 30 minutes then I'll have 
to record an attempted inspection. Just in case the employee was inside the facility, I knocked on door then yelled to see 
if anyone available. No response.. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious 
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
